required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Ozurdex® Treatment Practice in Patients With Macular Oedema Due to Retinal Vein Occlusion

brief_summary.textblock: Epidemiological study of Ozurdex® in sites treating patients with retinal vein occlusion.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA) in the Study Eye
primary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye Diagnosed With Branch Retinal Vein Occlusion (BRVO)
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. BRVO is a blockage of the small veins in the retina.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye Diagnosed With Central Retinal Vein Occlusion (CRVO)
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. CRVO is a blockage of the main vein in the retina.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye in Previously Treatment Naïve Patients
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. Treatment naïve patients have not been previously treated for retinal vein occlusion.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye in Patients Previously Treated With Ozurdex®
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. Previous treatment for retinal vein occlusion was Ozurdex®.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye in Patients Previously Naïve to Ozurdex® Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. Patients naive to Ozurdex® have not been previously treated for retinal vein occlusion.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye Based on Macular Edema Onset <3 Months
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. The onset of macular edema was <3 months prior to treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye Based on Macular Edema Onset ≥3 Months
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. The onset of macular edema was ≥3 months prior to treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye in Patients Only Treated With Ozurdex®
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. Patients had only been previously treated with Ozurdex®.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in BCVA in the Study Eye in Patients Receiving Ozurdex® and Then Other RVO Treatments
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened. Patients were previously treated with Ozurdex® and then switched to other RVO treatment during the study.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA) in the Study Eye
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Week 6, Month 4, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). A positive number change in the number of letters read means that the vision improved and a negative number change in the number of letters read means that the vision has worsened.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With BCVA Improvement of ≥15 Letters From Baseline in the Study Eye
secondary_outcome.description: BCVA is measured in the study eye using an eye chart and is reported as the number of letters read correctly (ranging from 0 to 100 letters). The lower the number of letters read correctly on the eye chart, the worse the vision (or visual acuity). The higher the number of letters read correctly, the better the vision (or visual acuity). An increase in the number of letters read correctly indicates improvement and a decrease in the number of letters read correctly indicates a worsening.

arm_group.description: dexamethasone intravitreal implant 700 μg administered into the eye according to physician judgment.

intervention.description: dexamethasone intravitreal implant 700 μg administered into the eye according to physician judgment.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with Macular Oedema due to Retinal Vein Occlusion

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Macular oedema due to retinal vein occlusion
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not living in metropolitan France

group.title: Ozurdex® (Dexamethasone Intravitreal Implant)
group.description: dexamethasone intravitreal implant 700 μg administered into the eye according to physician judgment.

event.sub_title: Sudden Falls Due to Legs Giving Way

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: A disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 90 days from the time submitted to the sponsor for review. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
